purpose: Facilitates decentralized communication and coordination among autonomous agents
principle: Utilizes a peer-to-peer network architecture built on Go for decentralized agent interactions
reusability: Modular architecture allows for integration with existing systems, supports API extensions for custom functionalities
limitations: Current implementation is in alpha stage, may have limited scalability and robustness in large networks
name: eternal-ai
highlight: Peer-to-peer autonomous agent system enabling decentralized communication and coordination
